tool_description: Collects comprehensive sales data including revenue, units sold, traffic metrics, and customer acquisition data for specified products and time periods.

start_date.description: Start date for sales data collection

end_date.description: End date for sales data collection

include_traffic_data.description: Whether to include page views and visitor data

include_customer_segments.description: Whether to segment by new vs returning customers

aggregation_level.description: Data aggregation level: daily, weekly, or monthly

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and within the last 2 years.
Product access denied: Insufficient permissions to access sales data for one or more products.
Invalid currency code: Currency code must be a valid 3-letter ISO code.
Data unavailable: Sales data not available for the specified time period.
Invalid aggregation level: Must be one of 'daily', 'weekly', or 'monthly'.
usage: Provide product_ids, start_date, and end_date. Configure optional parameters for detailed analysis including traffic data and customer segmentation.

total_revenue.description: Total revenue for all products in specified period

total_units_sold.description: Total units sold across all products

unique_visitors.description: Number of unique visitors to product pages

daily_revenues.description: Daily revenue figures for the period

daily_units.description: Daily units sold for the period
